attributes.action: Google has monopoly on Internet Marketing
attributes.additional_details:
Google is a Search Engine that provides search results to users around the world, Google has large share of the market as a search engine, Google has also a very large share in online advertising, providing advertising to businesses around the world and in the UK

I believe this needs to be regulated, a company of this size can not hold such a monopoly as  search engine, and as a advertising platform
